events.text: Get what you need and leave.
From this dilapidated, dare I call it an…
‘Establishment’ ?
What did you say?
Alistair, are you serious right now?
No wonder Gaia assigned this worthless town as our first assignment.
Our purchases here would be seen as a donation more than anything.
What the hell are you saying right now?
You going to get us-
Tell me about it.
I can see mold all over the floor.
No wonder Gaia assigned this worthless town as our first assignment.
Our purchases here would be seen as a donation more than anything.
Heh, seriously.
He should be thanking-
CLICK CLICK
Get the hell out of my shop and don’t come in here again...
A Remington 870 Express Tactical Shotgun.
You think something like that could hurt one of Gaia’s chosen?
Gaia’s chosen…
I’ve heard about a few altered somehow...evolving...from those researchers at the abandoned facility.
If it won’t work against your pretty little face…
Then I wonder what you have to say about it.
Kill ‘em if you want.
You’d be doing the world a favor if you did…
I’m warning you...
We’re leaving...
You left the shop.
Was that necessary, Alistair?!
You almost got us killed!
I would’ve been fine.
I’m the one that Gaia really needs anyway…
(I definitely can’t bring Alistair in there anymore.)
If you think it’s that easy to kill me…
I’d like to see you try!
BANG BANG!
(Well damn…)
(That was fast.)
You were killed by the Shopkeeper. - GAME OVER -
